------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


According to an ancient Chinese legend, every 60 years a strong sandstorm reveal where a sacred treasure and very valuable that was lost is found, the region of Dragon Gate. Rumors circulating the country indicate that this place is the famous Dragon Inn guesthouse, built to protect the treasure from thieves. During a match between violent mercenaries and the guardians of the treasure, the Dragon Inn was destroyed. Three years later, a new hostel was erected on the site and it became refuge for many fugitives from the law and outcasts socidade. Knowing that the day of the storm is near, this variety of villains unite to try to find the treasure of Dragon Gate.
